name: Tamil Nadu Govt. Staff Payroll Calculator-2
description: A comprehensive payroll calculator for Tamil Nadu government non-teaching staff, implementing pay revisions from the 2017 Pay Commission (G.O.Ms.No.303) and 2010 One Man Commission revisions. It calculates revised pay, Dearness Allowance (DA), House Rent Allowance (HRA), and handles annual increments, Selection Grade, and Special Grade awards from 2016 onwards.
